name: Photon
short_description: Photon open source app built upon photoscape. I have no more time nor motivation to maintain project any longer. There is no license at all or if in your country is must its realsed under Apache License 2.0. Its not doing much atm but use existing code as yours within any limitations. Project is heavily using JH Labs image processing filters its also adopted some from JAlbums filters inspired by Instagram. If you got any question you can pm me at dannywreczycki@gmail.com. Project is written in Java and can be run at any operating system but again good performance is only seen on windows (swing rendering pipeline problems on linux and solaris ;/).
